name: John Doe
wish: If you want to end the war, then instead of sending guns, send books. Instead of sending tanks, send pens. Instead of sending soldiers, send teachers.

name: Jane Doe
wish: Do your little bit of good where you are; it is those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world.

name: Jenny Smith
wish: Never be in a hurry; do everything quietly and in a calm spirit. Do not lose your inner peace for anything whatsoever, even if your whole world seems upset.

name: Jack Smith
wish: Every breath we take, every step we make, can be filled with peace, joy and serenity.

name: Alice Burton
wish: Don't search for anything except peace. Try to calm the mind. Everything else will come on its own.

name: Bob Burton
wish: When the power of love overcomes the love of power the world will know peace.

name: Mike Taylor
wish: The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.

name: Amanda Brown
wish: All our dreams can come true — if we have the courage to pursue them.
